title: Bamboo Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, Russian, Cambodian
description: Vegetarian restaurant and bar just off the beach though may be slight difficult to locate - look for its big signage. Offers a large menu with Russian and Khmer focus. Full cocktail bar, cold beer, and many kinds of tea. Has ping-pong tables, Xbox, table games, Wi-Fi.
